game.name: Goldblade Water Adventure
game.description:
This brand new adventure game has brought to us more challenges and fun as you have to guide here a lady runner instead of a boy. Do you think that you are skilled enough to help this cute girl reach her destination point in each level? Join Goldblade Water Adventure and show off the world that you can control anyone to run over the platforms! You find Trinks, very friendly creatures at a beautiful island that is located in a far away magical world. The courageous princess Goldblade is loved by all of them. 

She has the power to protect people from all the uninvited obstacles. However, something wrong happened there suddenly. A horde of deadly monsters from the waters has attacked the place and stole all the necessary treasures of Trinks. Not only this, they also stole the children. Today the cute princess Goldblade has decided to fight against the monsters and bring treasures and children back. Help the brave lady to deal with multiple traps, monsters, as well as challenges of varied sizes in this cute html5 platform game!

Contorl the princess using the arrow keys, C and X keys on desktop and GUI buttons when play on mobile phones! There are countless fighting games for free available on atmegame.com where you can keep you glued to the screen. No chance of getting bored as this cool mobile game features many levels and colorful graphics. Check out more top princess games online without download! Good luck to enjoy an immersive gaming experience!!
